INITCONFIG.TEXTAREA:
In the opened Steam window, install Spacewar on the disk where you want the wineprefix to be, and do not create shortcuts in the application menu or desktop (uncheck the boxes)

When Spacewar is installed:
1. Right-click on it in the library
2. Open "Properties", then "Compatibility"
3. Enable the use of the Steam Play compatibility tool
4. Select the Proton version to be used for all games with OnlineFix (it is recommended to use Proton GE if you have installed it, or Proton Experimental and Hotfix)
5. Wait for Spacewar to update and launch it

The program will then detect the Spacewar process, terminate it, and proceed to the next step.
If this does not happen, check all the steps.
INITCONFIG.NOPROTONTRICKS: Install protontricks (flatpak is not supported) before using the launcher
FILESWORKER.NOPROTONTRICKS: Protontricks-launch is required to start the game, but it was not found in /usr/bin
FILESWORKER.FAKESTEAMENABLED: Error bypass enabled. Try launching the game again
FILESWORKER.ISSTEAMNOTSTARTEDERROR: Did you just see the "Steam is not running" error?
LOGFORM.HEADER: Oops.. It seems that this game didn't work as it should
LOGFORM.SUBHEADER: Here is its log, which you can send to the launcher developer for analysis and possible fixes.
